meanings.definition: A group of officials appointed to assist a cabinet or other high-ranking body.
meanings.sent1: The subcabinet met to discuss new policies with the main cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The subcabinet members work closely with the cabinet to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the subcabinet accidentally spilled coffee on important documents.
meanings.sent4: The subcabinet is like the supporting actors in a play, crucial to the overall performance.
meanings.sent5: In the government play, the subcabinet plays a vital role behind the scenes.

meanings.definition: A lower level of government officials below the cabinet level.
meanings.sent1: The subcabinet manages day-to-day operations at the local level.
meanings.sent2: Local subcabinet members handle community issues efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The subcabinet organized a fun fair for the town residents.
meanings.sent4: In the hierarchy, the subcabinet is like the foundation supporting the upper levels.
meanings.sent5: The subcabinet ensures smooth functioning of government services in the region.
